title: Orthonormal and periodic levels for Quantum Cascade Laser simulation
authors: Zakaria Mohamed, D. Ekin \"Onder, and Andreas Wacker
abstract:
A Python package to evaluate Wannier, Wannier-Stark, and EZ (both Energy and
location Z resolved) levels for Quantum Cascade Lasers is presented. We provide
the underlying theory in detail with a focus on the orthonormality and
periodicity of the generated states.
